Package com.fluidops.iwb.wiki

Semantic Wiki framework engine.

Class Summary
FluidHTMLConverter Customized Wiki to HTML converter.
FluidWikiModel The IWikiModel model implementation for FluidWiki.
ImgTag  
TP parser for nested template parameters / widget config
WikiBot  
WikiDirectoryCache  
WikiFileStorage File-based wiki storage implementation.
WikiH2SQLStorage WikiStorage for H2SQL database.
Wikimedia This class parses Wikimedia page content and extracts semantic statements.
Wikimedia.LookupConfig Configuration for replacing variables in templates, for each $this.property[resolver]$ there is exactly one config.
WikiMySQLStorage WikiStorage for MySQL database.
WikiRedirector  
WikiSQLStorageBase SQL-based wiki storage implementation.
WikiStorage Wiki storage with revisions and meta data management.
WikiStorage.WikiRevision Meta data of a document revision.
WikiSynchronizer Static methods for synchronizing semantic links in Wiki when statements have been changed/deleted outside the Wiki.
 

Package com.fluidops.iwb.wiki Description

Semantic Wiki framework engine.
Provides Semantic Wiki persistance, editing, versioning, and rendering support. Integrates with live semantic RDF data sources and extensible Widget framework.
